name: Workloop AI
description: Workloop is the future of AI automation - a prompt-native, no-code platform that replaces manual builders with self-deploying agents. The future of productivity is agent-powered. No fluff. No prompt tweaking. No endless app switching. Just AI that gets things done. Vibe-workflow at your fingertips. Workloop AI = No-code AI agents Drag. Drop. Deploy in minutes. Agents that plug into: – Slack – Notion – Gmail – Salesforce – Asana … and much more. Automate research, emails, tasks, posts — anything. Workloop is the AI-native alternative to n8n, Zapier, and other no-code builders. But instead of wasting hours dragging logic blocks… You just describe what you want. It builds it. It runs it. It learns. Who's building it? Frank Ramos – 10+ yrs in enterprise infra – Ex-Disney, Fox Sports, Sono – Built streaming tech for F500s – Solana Hackathon winner (2022) – Now building the AI future
